EmailTemplate.name: First Defect Notice EWP
EmailTemplate.subject: First Defect Notice: {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!License_Registration__c.Applicant__c}:
Your {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} application for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been reviewed and defected for not meeting all of the {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} requirements. Please review the attached First Defect Notice included in this email, which lists each specific defect in your application. You are required to complete the requested adjustments to your application and re-submit it within {!License_Registration__c.Defect_Response_Time__c} days from the date of this email. To resubmit your application once defect items are complete and saved, on the left-hand screen list, scroll down and click on "Completion Review", select "Yes" and <Next>, then click <Submit> on the "Submit" screen. Note that if you do not resubmit the application within {!License_Registration__c.Defect_Response_Time__c} days from the date of this email, your application may be eligible for closure.
To log in and make changes, please visit{!Rejection__c.Registration_Community_URL__c} and select {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} number {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}. {!License_Registration__c.Registration_Site__c}
Sincerely, Entertainment Work Permit Unit Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California Phone: (818)901-5484
